name: ListIncidentWorkflows
description:
Retrieve all incident workflows in your PagerDuty account.

Use this tool to list all existing Incident Workflows in your PagerDuty account, which consist of configurable steps and triggers for automated actions. Ideal for managing workflows related to incidents.
